meanings.definition: The process of infecting or the state of being infected.
meanings.sent1: Infections can spread quickly in crowded places.
meanings.sent2: Doctors are working hard to treat the infections in the hospital.
meanings.sent3: The classroom had a case of infections, but luckily everyone recovered.
meanings.sent4: Fear and negativity can be infections that affect our minds.
meanings.sent5: The infections in the community highlighted the importance of hygiene.

meanings.definition: A disease caused by microorganisms, especially those that release toxins or invade body tissues.
meanings.sent1: Severe infections can be life-threatening if not treated promptly.
meanings.sent2: The antibiotics were prescribed to fight the bacterial infections.
meanings.sent3: The picnic was ruined by food infections, causing everyone to feel sick.
meanings.sent4: Misinformation can spread like infections, causing confusion and chaos.
meanings.sent5: The infections in the garden destroyed all the plants, showing the power of nature.
